comments:
When I am trying to run a Ant file I keep getting no messages on the Console, just a message on the Console window's title bar (across the top). It says 
"<terminated> JiBxBuild [Ant Build] D:\bea\jdk142_05\bin\javaw.exe (Jul 31, 2006 8:31:55pm)". I've checked the log file and it says:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ant.ui 4 120 2006-07-31 20:32:05.609
!MESSAGE Error logged from Ant UI: 
!STACK 0
java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Accept timed out
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketAccept(Native Method)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.accept(PlainSocketImpl.java:353)
	at java.net.ServerSocket.implAccept(ServerSocket.java:448)
	at java.net.ServerSocket.accept(ServerSocket.java:419)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.RemoteAntBuildListener$ServerConnection.run(RemoteAntBuildListener.java:97)

I've check Ant classpath in both Run / External Tools / Classpath tab and Windows / Preference / Ant / Runtime / Classpath tab and they are the same, pointing to Ant 1.6.5.

Any ideas how to fix this ?

Thanks in advance,
Marcia

PS: I have another view and Ant works fine there.
I've found the problem. I have added some VM arguments (-server -Xms128m -Xmx768m  -XX:MaxPermSize=680m) in the selected Installed JRE and it was causing a problem.
